Package com.example.bubbletracksapp

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.bubbletracksapp.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class Event extends Object implements android.os.Parcelable
this tracks the information of a given event

    • Event

      Constructor that creates an event from a document snapshot

    • Event

      public Event(String id, String name, Date dateTime, String description, String geolocation, String facility, Date registrationOpen, Date registrationClose, int maxCapacity, int price, int waitListLimit, boolean needsGeolocation, String image, String QRCode, ArrayList<String> waitList, ArrayList<String> invitedList, ArrayList<String> cancelledList, ArrayList<String> rejectedList, ArrayList<String> enrolledList)
      constructor given all the attributes of the event
      Parameters:
      id - id of the event
      name - name of the event
      dateTime - date and time of the event
      description - description for the event
      geolocation - location of the event
      facility - id of the facility where the event will be
      registrationOpen - registration open date of the event
      registrationClose - registration close date of the event
      maxCapacity - capacity of the event
      price - price of the event
      waitListLimit - limit of the waitlist
      needsGeolocation - geolocation requirement for the event
      image - download link for the event's poster
      QRCode - download link for the event's QR code
      waitList - array of ids of entrants that are in the waitlist
      invitedList - array of ids of entrants that are invited to the event
      cancelledList - array of ids of entrants that are cancelled from the event
      rejectedList - array of ids of entrants that are rejected from the waitlist
      enrolledList - array of ids of entrants that are enrolled for the event
